column1: No spring or summer sports.  MAYBE fall sports. We may not see sports for the rest of 2020. Coronavirus isn’t going to just go away overnight. It will take time and limiting large gatherings for as long as possible is going to be one of the keys...

No spring or summer sports.  MAYBE fall sports. We may not see sports for the rest of 2020. Coronavirus isn’t going to just go away overnight. It will take time and limiting large gatherings for as long as possible is going to be one of the keys...
